summary: Follow the Rolling Stones on their 1972 North American Tour and their first return to the States since the tragedy at Altamont.
cast: Truman Capote|Dick Cavett|Marshall Chess|Chris Collins|Ahmet Ertegun|Steve Geolke|Nicky Hopkins|Bianca Jagger|Mick Jagger|Bobby Keyes|Bobby Keys|Otto Levine|Jim Price|Lee Radziwill|Keith Richards|The Rolling Stones|Peter Rudge|Danny Seymour|Terry Southern|Mick Taylor|Tina Turner|Andy Warhol|Charlie Watts|Stevie Wonder|Bill Wyman
title: Cocksucker Blues
